data.title: Beyoncé - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Beyoncé: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Former member of the R&B girl group Destiny's Child who also became a widely successful solo artist. She has won a total of 32 Grammy Awards, more than any other woman, for songs such as "Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)," "Drunk in Love" and "Crazy in Love." Also an actress, she starred in the popular film Dreamgirls and voiced Nala in The Lion King.

Before Fame

She won her first school talent show with her rendition of "Imagine" by John Lennon.

Trivia

In 2019, she released the documentary entitled Homecoming. She has over 318 million followers on her popular Instagram account. In 2023, she became the artist with the most Grammy wins of all time.

Family Life

Her birth name is Beyoncé Giselle Knowles. She married rap star Jay-Z on April 4, 2008. They had a daughter named Blue Ivy in 2012, followed by a pair of twins named Rumi and Sir in June 2017. She has a sister named Solange, a half-brother named Nixon, and a half-sister named Koi.

Associated With

She featured rapper Kendrick Lamar on the 2016 song "Freedom" from her sixth studio album Lemonade.

Video
